title: Ticket #152: Move gitweb to pinguino
description: Moving gitweb to pinguino means it can avoid the monthly problem with AFS.
remarks:
2009-Sep-29 11:14:21 by adesmet:
Possible STUDENTTASK.

2009-Dec-27 18:07:13 by matt:
Can we consider this complete with the new repo mirror?

I think the only other thing needed is to push build tags to the mirror. Release tags should go too.

The NMI repo can be redirected to use pinguino pretty easily.
creator: matt
